title: 3days running...
body:
There are 2 players that have been trolling for 3 days running players are reporting them so why is it that the system isnt picking them up....
Dont tell me to send a support ticket in either...because thats saying hte system is a failing....
Im more then happy to provide names of the 2 players for some1 with balls to look at there stats and there items they are buying and if you can get it the chat logs from theses 2 players....
Because players are reporting them but there still playing....

replies.body: Repeat posting isn't gonna help you m8, if you're set against submitting a ticket then don't but geez just move on.
